name: rebreed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to breed again, or to make an animal breed again: If a cow fails to re-breed, its value drops significantly. Do not re-breed animals that are in poor physical condition.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is too late in the breeding season to rebreed the mare.Their observations confirmed that a sizeable proportion of the ewes and their crosses may rebreed during this period.Adequate nutrition must be provided for a cow to rebreed for a 365-day calving interval.
